document.full_text: u.s. auto and auto parts exports to south korea should increase about 54 percent under a proposed free trade deal that was revised to address auto industry concerns, a new government study said on thursday.
document.title: little change from revised south korea car deal: u.s. itc
lines_and_colors: u.s. auto and auto parts exports to south korea should increase about 54 percent under a proposed free trade deal that was revised to address auto industry concerns, a new government study said on thursday.
